DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether three airway clearance techniques ( Bouncing, Assisted Autogenic Drainage ( AAD) and bouncing and AAD) provoke or aggravate gastro-esophageal reflux in infants under the age of 1 year.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Airway Clearance Techniques in Infants.
DOC.criteria: infants < 1 year acid reflux monitoring gestational age <24 w antireflux medication Nissen fundoplication no parental consent
